## IDecoratorRegistration.initializeBy() method

Specifies initialization action during service instantiation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initializeBy<K extends T>(action: Initializer<K>): WithDecoratorRegisterInitializeBy<K>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
